location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No.742 [Political Department] from John Bax, Secretary to the Bombay Government, to the Assistant in Charge of the Residency of the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of a letter dated 24 March 1831, which enclosed a translated excerpt of a letter from the Imam of Muscat, announcing the renewal of hostilities between himself and his relation the Governor of SohƒÅr. Bax requests that his recipient intercede to settle the dispute.
